mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.date AS "date", a.stats_date AS "statsDate", a.one_room_amount AS "oneRoomAmount", a.two_room_amount AS "twoRoomAmount", a.three_room_amount AS "threeRoomAmount", a.cal_one_room_amount AS "calOneRoomAmount", a.bdate AS "bdate", a.edate AS "edate", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO month_rent_amount_city( id, city_id, date, stats_date, one_room_amount, two_room_amount, three_room_amount, cal_one_room_amount, bdate, edate, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cityId}, #{date}, #{statsDate}, #{oneRoomAmount}, #{twoRoomAmount}, #{threeRoomAmount}, #{calOneRoomAmount}, #{bdate}, #{edate}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE month_rent_amount_city SET id = #{id}, city_id = #{cityId}, date = #{date}, stats_date = #{statsDate}, one_room_amount = #{oneRoomAmount}, two_room_amount = #{twoRoomAmount}, three_room_amount = #{threeRoomAmount}, cal_one_room_amount = #{calOneRoomAmount}, bdate = #{bdate}, edate = #{edate}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
